qlearning
Interface IRewardStore

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
RewardMemorizer, RewardMemorizerNN, RewardMemorizerNNSinglePass
public interface IRewardStore
extends java.io.Serializable

Framework defining methods to store, retrieve, enumerate state/action values.

Author:
Francesco De Comite
